headline: One thing that makes AI companies 'very compelling' for investors
summary: Citi Head of US equity strategy Scott Chronert speaks with Julie Hyman on what he is seeing out of AI companes' financial health and free cash flow trends. Also catch Scott Chronert explain the Citi team's strategy at investing in "growth at a reasonable price." To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Should Citigroup’s (C) CEO-Chair Consolidation Reshape Investors’ Views on Strategy and Leadership?
summary: Earlier this week, Citigroup's board named CEO Jane Fraser as Chair of the Board, consolidating the top leadership roles and awarding her a one-time equity grant valued at US$25 million in stock and options vesting over several years. This unprecedented move underscores the board's commitment to continuity and Fraser’s ongoing transformation strategy as Citi continues to streamline operations, expand digital initiatives, and report broad-based financial improvement. We’ll explore how the...
